Functions
BG_GetRandPosition
uint BG_GetRandPosition(
void
)

Get random position for player or computer bot.

Returns

On success it returns random position in range [0 to BOARD_SIZE] and On Error it return -1.

BG_GetRandTurn
uint BG_GetRandTurn(
int turn_1,
int turn_2
)
Get random player turn  between 1

2 players.

Parameters
turn_1
int

Number designated with player_1's player_turn.

turn_2
int

Number designated with player_2's player_turn.

Returns

Returns random turn in range [Player_1 to Player_2].

BG_GetPlayerTurn
int BG_GetPlayerTurn(
int play_mode,
int n_players,
bool roll_dice,
bool print_info
)
Get player turn  between 2

4 players including player vs computer.

Parameters
play_mode
int

Game playing mode use Enum PLAY_MODE to provide values.

n_players
int

Number  of players playing. [Required only in FRIEND_MODE].

roll_dice
bool

Ask for roll dice input or not . Use TRUE or FALSE.

print_info
bool

Whether to print information on rolled dice numbers or not . Use TRUE or FALSE.

Returns

Returns turn number related with player_id. [See Enum PLAYER_ID for more information.]

BG_GetScorePercent
float BG_GetScorePercent(
int total_score,
int total_games
)

Get total score in percentage.

Parameters
total_score
int

Total score of player.

total_games
int

Total games played by player.

Returns

Returns score percentage in float format.
